manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: OUR HISTORY Since 1992, CODi has remained a trusted adviser and one of the laptop case manufacturers in all things mobile technology protection and connectivity. CODi’s extensive line of products are specially designed to simplify the lives of today’s connected society. Headquartered in Garnet Valley, Pennsylvania, we provide Fortune 1000 Companies, Education, Government, and Small Businesses with a wide range of functional mobility products, such as protective laptop briefcases and backpacks, tablet covers, computer security hardware, and electronic accessories, all designed with style. In 2018, CODi was acquired by a Veteran operated team, led by former United States Naval Academy roommates, Anthony Piccioni and Graham Cleveland. Anthony, a United States Marine Corps Infantry Officer, who led Marines on multiple combat tours in Afghanistan, now leads the team for CODi.

OUR HISTORY Since 1992, CODi has remained a trusted adviser and one of the laptop case manufacturers in all things mobile technology protection and connectivity. CODi’s extensive line of products are specially designed to simplify the lives of today’s connected society. Headquartered in Garnet Valley, Pennsylvania, we provide Fortune 1000 Companies, Education, Government, and Small Businesses with a wide range of functional mobility products, such as protective laptop briefcases and backpacks, tablet covers, computer security hardware, and electronic accessories, all designed with style. In 2018, CODi was acquired by a Veteran operated team, led by former United States Naval Academy roommates, Anthony Piccioni and Graham Cleveland. Anthony, a United States Marine Corps Infantry Officer, who led Marines on multiple combat tours in Afghanistan, now leads the team for CODi.

WHO WE ARE CODi is a worldwide provider in B2B mobile technology protection and connectivity products. As your one-stop mobility solution to help you connect from anywhere, we offer complete package solutions to simplify your connectivity needs. The core of CODi’s product portfolio is a premium line of laptop bags and cases offering superior asset protection. OUR VALUES Within every business practice, we integrate our core values: Integrity, Service, and Dependability OUR MISSION To bring the best experience, by securing and protecting every asset with style. We strive to be the most dependable producer of innovative, protective gear & mobile accessories for all things tech, by understanding the needs of today’s connected society. We’re determined to put our customers before ourselves and to protect their assets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, no issue
reviews.reviewText: Shipped and received asap. Works perfectly every time and picture is clear. Great value for the money, and I definitely recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very clear video, crisp sound, and easy to set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Recent iterations of this model seem not as good as an earlier one I owned
reviews.reviewText: I'd had one of these for about a year. It had quite reasonable autofocus and sound. That was accidentally damaged, my own clumsy fault.So I purchased a new one, presumably the exact same A05020 model. The first replacement had poor autofocus. I sent first replacement back. Amazon replaced it with a refurb, but I figured I'd try it anyways.Autofocus still defective, but now the sound was weirdly muffled. Inspection revealed that the sound holes (microphone grate) were no longer the same style and not even in the same position. Before, a six hole array near bottom of the front panel; now, fewer holes and near the top on one of the replacement and near the bottom on the other. The new holes do not line up with the location of the microphones on he circuit board in the original model. I assume the mic location did not change and Also, newer model not recognized in the same way as the old model by certain of my software. Definitely been some redesign, and it did not work out well.AND, for good measure, the supplied refurb was missing the privacy cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great improvement over our previous purchase of a Bietrun. Sharp picture and great sound pick up from the internal mic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick & Super Simple
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and flexible to change viewing directions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Spend a few extra bucks and get something better
reviews.reviewText: I bought this Codi webcam because it was so cheap and had good reviews... well I'm not sure who has a worse camera than this, but it was pretty bad. I bought this to upgrade my webcam on my 2012 Apple Thunderbolt 27" monitor built in camera. I have it plugged into my 2020 M1 Macbook air, but I keep the lid closed so I never use that one. Anyways, the Codi was the worst out of three. Built in isite thunderbolt camera, a $22 Vascam webcam I bought on Amazon a year ago, and the Codi I just purchased. Forgive the mess in the pictures, but you can probably see the detail on the mess and how bad the codi is. Also the Codi is SO close. They were all on the same monitor about 2.5 feet from my face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is a CODI camera without an APP
reviews.reviewText: Momentum has unilaterally stolen our money.They sell a camera then disconnect the APP to use the camera.They are now all Paperweights.Hopefully their is a class action lawsuit.
